statements: SELECT * FROM capital_gains;
SELECT user_id, investment_type, investment_date FROM capital_gains;
SELECT purchase_price, sale_price, capital_gain FROM capital_gains;
SELECT * FROM capital_gains WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM capital_gains ORDER BY investment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM capital_gains WHERE investment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, investment_type, purchase_price, sale_price FROM capital_gains WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, investment_date, capital_gain FROM capital_gains WHERE capital_gain > 1000 AND purchase_price < 50000 ORDER BY investment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM capital_gains WHERE sale_price > purchase_price * 1.1;
SELECT investment_type, AVG(capital_gain) AS avg_capital_gain FROM capital_gains GROUP BY investment_type HAVING COUNT(id) > 1 ORDER BY avg_capital_gain DESC;
SELECT * FROM capital_gains;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount, sale_amount FROM capital_gains ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT investor_name, sale_amount FROM capital_gains WHERE sale_amount > 10000;
SELECT DISTINCT investor_name FROM capital_gains;
SELECT id, investor_name, investment_date FROM capital_gains WHERE investment_amount >= 5000 ORDER BY investment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM capital_gains WHERE investor_name = 'Alice' AND sale_amount > 5000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT investor_name, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM capital_gains GROUP BY investor_name;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount, sale_amount, return_amount FROM capital_gains JOIN investment_returns ON capital_gains.investor_name = investment_returns.investor_name;

SELECT investor_name, investment_date, return_date FROM capital_gains INNER JOIN investment_returns ON capital_gains.investor_name = investment_returns.investor_name WHERE investment_amount >= 10000 ORDER BY investment_date;
SELECT DISTINCT investor_name, investment_amount FROM capital_gains UNION SELECT DISTINCT investor_name, return_amount FROM investment_returns ORDER BY investor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM capital_gains;
SELECT id, user_id, investment_date FROM capital_gains WHERE investment_currency = 'USD';
SELECT user_id, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investments FROM capital_gains GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, transaction_type, amount, currency FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, investment_date, investment_amount, investment_currency, gain_amount, gain_currency FROM capital_gains;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE tax_id = '123456';
SELECT id, user_id, transaction_date, transaction_type, amount, currency FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM capital_gains WHERE investment_amount > 1000 AND gain_amount > 500;
SELECT id, user_id, investment_date, investment_amount, investment_currency, gain_amount, gain_currency FROM capital_gains WHERE user_id = '123abc' ORDER BY investment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT investment_id, user_id, investment_type FROM investments ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, sum(amount) AS total_invested FROM investments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM capital_gains WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_gains FROM capital_gains GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_gains > 10000;

SELECT users.name, investments.investment_type, transactions.amount FROM users JOIN investments ON users.user_id = investments.user_id JOIN transactions ON investments.investment_id = transactions.investment_id WHERE transactions.transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 5 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM capital_gains WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM capital_gains;
SELECT cryptocurrency, sale_amount FROM capital_gains WHERE date_of_sale='2022-09-15';
SELECT investor_name, total_investment FROM investors ORDER BY total_investment DESC;
SELECT investor_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date='2022-10-01';
SELECT investor_id, SUM(amount) AS total_holdings FROM holdings GROUP BY investor_id;
SELECT * FROM capital_gains ORDER BY date_of_sale DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT investor_name, total_investment FROM investors WHERE total_investment > 10000 ORDER BY total_investment DESC;
SELECT investor_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY investor_id HAVING total_transactions > 5000 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT investor_id, cryptocurrency, amount FROM holdings WHERE cryptocurrency IN ('Bitcoin', 'Ethereum') ORDER BY investor_id, cryptocurrency;
SELECT * FROM tax_reports WHERE tax_paid > 0 ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 5;
